title: Formula 1 Ticket App
description: Laravel Formula 1 app that shows data with chart.js and allows the user to order tickets to different grand prix's. Third semester Web Technology Project

title: Formula 1: Stories
description: Formula 1 app where users could share their experiences and post photos of events they went to

title: Magic The Gathering deck builder
